name: Wrist Racer
description:
A Date back to the good old days when the likes of Neilsonic and Casio were the kings of Game Watches and every kid wanted to have a game on their wrist.

Control is simple:

Press "Start" to - well........ Start playing really.

Press "Menu" to change the colours of the game.

Use the left and right buttons to dodge as many cars as you can and try to get the highest score.

Erm............

And that's it really.

Have Fun. :-)
